paper_abstract: Fundamentals of the theory of system alliances are briefly reviewed. An accent is put on interfaces (IFs). The model of IFs consisting of a pair of finite deterministic automata sharing a part of their internal state space is introduced. The presented model of alliance interface can be successfully implemented for the study of typical phenomena in complex heterogeneous objects with a significant degree of uncertainty.
paper_title: ALLIANCE APPROACH TO THE MODELING OF INTERFACES IN COMPLEX HETEROGENEOUS OBJECTS
